abstracts.cdata!:
This Aide Memoire on Hurricane Felix
            Emergency Recovery Project in Nicaragua reports that a World
            Bank mission visited the North Atlantic Autonomous Region of
            Nicaragua (RAAN) from the 4th to the 6th February, 2014 to
            provide emergency follow-up on the Draft Emergency recovery
            after Hurricane Felix. The main objective of the mission was
            to support critical issues that are affecting the execution
            of the project, and monitor the agreed Action Plan to
            improve the performance of the same. In addition, the
            mission supervised IDF advanced donations for the
            institutional Strengthening of GRAAN. In order to meet this
            purpose, conducted work sessions and visited communities and
            works were carried out under the project. This aide memoire
            summarizes the findings, recommendations and agreements
            reached during the mission, and will be publicly disclosed.
